PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-11562014-10-30,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 6
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, no. 6 in order to (1) formalize and give legal effect to previously announced measures and to provide taxpayers with certainty as to the application of the GST/HST regulations; and (2) address needed housekeeping amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0248 Publication Date: 2014-11-19
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 6
precis: Regulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, no. 6 in order to (1) formalize and give legal effect to previously announced measures and to provide taxpayers with certainty as to the application of the GST/HST regulations; and (2) address needed housekeeping amendments.
